title: [RED] Rust template tests
description: Write failing tests for Rust template. Should create Cargo project with WASM target, SDK bindings, and example function.

title: GREEN: Implement env var whitelist for subprocesses
description: Modify subprocess spawn calls to only pass safe env vars (PATH, HOME, PYTHONIOENCODING) instead of spreading all of process.env.

title: Fix circuit breaker half-open logic
description: Circuit breaker in function-loader.ts:330-345 transitions to half-open but proceeds with normal loading, potentially re-opening immediately. Should follow proper CB semantics with limited test requests.

title: [Refactor] Zig SDK patterns and capnweb bindings
description: Extract Zig SDK template. Generate capnweb bindings from Zig exports. Add build.zig template. Target 10-100KB output.

title: [Spike] AssemblyLoadContext for hot-swapping user code
description: Test using .NET AssemblyLoadContext to dynamically load/unload user assemblies into a warm runtime. Enables fast function updates without runtime cold start. Requires cooperative unloading.

title: [Spike] Shared .NET Runtime Worker architecture
description: Explore architecture where .NET runtime lives in a dedicated long-running worker. Individual C# functions are thin stubs that RPC to the runtime worker. Benefits: fast cold start for functions, amortized runtime cost across many functions, runtime stays warm.
close_reason: RED tests and spikes completed by agents

title: [RED] dotdo rollback - Rollback to version
description: Write failing tests for dotdo rollback command. Should list available versions, confirm rollback, and update active version.

title: [GREEN] Stabilize Rust WASM compilation
description: Make Rust WASM tests pass. Fix any issues with rustc/wasm-pack invocation, WASM binary generation, and TypeScript bindings.

title: Implement WorkerLoader error propagation
description: 4 failing tests - syntax errors, runtime errors with stack, console output, promise rejections

title: [Green] Implement C# stub + runtime worker pattern
description: Implement thin C# stub (~KB) that delegates to shared .NET runtime worker. Runtime worker uses AssemblyLoadContext to load user code. Service Binding for RPC.
close_reason: GREEN implementations complete - all tests pass

title: [GREEN] Implement metrics export
description: Make metrics tests pass. Integrate with existing ObservabilityExporter, add Prometheus/Datadog export.

title: [GREEN] Generate API Reference
description: Generate API reference from code. Include all endpoints, parameters, response types, and error codes.

title: RED: Write benchmark tests for LRU cache eviction
description: Write tests measuring LRU cache eviction performance. Current O(n) implementation in function-loader.ts:658-671 iterates all entries on every eviction.

title: [Red] Test create-function scaffolds TypeScript project
description: Write failing test: npx create-function hello --lang typescript creates directory with package.json, tsconfig.json, src/index.ts, wrangler.toml. Verify all files have correct content.
close_reason: RED tests and spikes completed by agents

title: [RED] GET /functions - List functions endpoint
description: Write failing tests for list functions API. Should return paginated list with metadata, versions, and status.

title: [GREEN] Complete TypeScript template
description: Make TypeScript template tests pass. Include SDK bindings, type generation, and local dev setup.

title: Python Language Support
description: Python support via Cloudflare's native Python Workers (Pyodide). Memory snapshots provide ~1s cold starts. Full package ecosystem including NumPy, Pandas, FastAPI.
close_reason: Python language support complete - 200+ tests pass, Pyodide callbacks, memory snapshots, SDK bundling all working

title: [Refactor] TypeScript compilation SDK patterns
description: Clean up TypeScript compilation code. Extract reusable patterns for dot-do-capnweb SDK template. Add source maps, error handling.
close_reason: TypeScript SDK compiler 30/31 tests pass - signature extraction, type generation, capnweb bindings, and documentation generation working

title: [Green] Implement Rust→WASM compilation pipeline
description: Implement wasm-pack-based compilation of user Rust to WASM. Include wasm-bindgen setup for JS interop. Make the red test pass.
close_reason: Wave 3 completed - GREEN implementations and tests done

title: [RED] Getting Started guide tests
description: Write tests that validate getting started guide. Should have working code examples, correct CLI commands, and accurate output.

title: GREEN: Fix escapeForPython() injection vulnerability
description: Fix the string escaping in escapeForPython() to properly escape triple-quoted strings. Consider using subprocess stdin instead of -c argument for safer code passing.

title: [GREEN] Implement log aggregation
description: Make log aggregation tests pass. Use FunctionLogs DO to aggregate, support querying, and add CLI integration.

title: [RED] dotdo invoke - Invoke function
description: Write failing tests for dotdo invoke command. Should send request to function and display response with timing info.

title: Core Platform Infrastructure
description: Foundation infrastructure for Functions.do: Worker Loader integration, capnweb function invocation, function registry, deployment pipeline. Must be completed before any language support is functional.

title: [Green] Implement func dev with miniflare
description: Implement func dev CLI. Detect language from config. Start appropriate build watcher. Launch miniflare with Worker Loader binding. Proxy requests to function.

title: [RED] Go template tests
description: Write failing tests for Go template. Should create go.mod, WASM build script, SDK bindings, and example function.

title: [RED] dotdo secrets - Manage secrets
description: Write failing tests for dotdo secrets subcommands (set, get, list, delete). Should securely store and retrieve environment secrets.

title: Add network partition tests for FunctionRegistry
description: No tests for KV failures, partial writes, network timeouts. Add resilience tests simulating Cloudflare KV failures.

title: [RED] Log aggregation tests
description: Write failing tests for log aggregation. Should collect logs from all functions, support filtering, and stream in real-time.

title: [Spike] Capnweb RpcTarget integration with Worker Loader
description: Test how capnweb RpcTarget can invoke dynamically loaded code via Worker Loader. Validate promise pipelining works across the boundary.
